name: Masha and the Bear: Toy doctor
description: Do you know this children emergency that hurries in the forest hospital? Have you seen this doctor who brings all the toys that need healing? This is, of course, Masha doctor from the cartoon Masha and the Bear! Forest kids hospital opens its door for patients, who have all the possible unbelievable and funny diseases, no one doctor has heard about them. This is the most interesting and funniest kids game for boys and girls! Unpack children medical instruments and start to work! Make funny diagnosis, prepare yummy medicine and make injections! Nobody could escape funny treatment!  The peculiarities of the game Masha and the Bear, Dolls doctor:  - a variety of playing levels, player can heal a lot of different animals - Masha is going to heal strange diseases that toys have - make diagnosis, prepare medicine, make injections - favorite toys from the cartoon Masha and the Bear  - medical instruments for children - syringe, enema, pain reliever - exciting and simple gameplay - forest hospital for children, for boys and girls. - kids emergency for dolls - listen to pleasant music and chat with Masha and the Bear cartoon characters  All animals and toys from Masha and the Bear cartoon want to be healed by the best doctor in the kids hospital. But there are so many patients, that doctor needs help. Only you could help!
